faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: We're here to answer all your questions.

items.question: Why choose SmoothFlowTech as an IT software service provider?
items.answer: SmoothFlowTech stands out as a trusted IT software service provider for its proven track record of delivering high-quality, innovative, and scalable software solutions tailored to meet your business needs. With a customer-centric approach, agile methodologies, and a team of experienced developers, we ensure timely delivery, robust security, and exceptional post-delivery support.

items.question: What different hiring models do you offer?
items.answer:
We offer flexible hiring models to cater to diverse business requirements, including:
1. **Dedicated Team Model**: A dedicated team works exclusively on your project, ideal for long-term collaboration.
2. **Time and Material Model**: Pay for the actual hours worked, suitable for projects with evolving requirements.
3. **Fixed Price Model**: A pre-agreed cost for projects with well-defined scopes and timelines.
4. **Hybrid Model**: A combination of the above models to offer maximum flexibility and cost-efficiency.

items.question: How do you ensure the security of our data?
items.answer: Data security is a top priority. We prioritize the security of your information by implementing industry-leading security measures. Additionally, all team members are bound by strict confidentiality agreements to ensure your privacy is always protected.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to empower our customers by bringing their ideas and needs to life through comprehensive digital development. We focus on creating efficient, automated, and user-friendly websites, software, and mobile applications that simplify processes and elevate user experiences. Our passion for automation and intuitive design ensures that every digital solution we deliver flows smoothly and seamlessly, making technology accessible and enjoyable for our clients.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We aspire to empower a diverse range of customers to realize their dreams of successful e-commerce platforms, innovative websites, cutting-edge digital services, and robust software solutions. Our vision is to continuously expand our presence in the market, establishing Smooth Flow Tech as a leading force in the technology industry by delivering exceptional, user-friendly, and automated digital products that drive our clients' success and satisfaction.

slogan.title: Our Slogan
slogan.subTitle: "Flowing Ideas into Digital Reality"
slogan.description: This slogan embodies our commitment to transforming creative ideas into functional and visually appealing digital products, highlighting our strength in idea development and user-friendly design.

items.title: Expertise
items.description: Led by a skilled full-stack developer, our team brings a wealth of technical knowledge and hands-on experience to every project.

items.title: Customer-Centric Approach
items.description: We prioritize making our customers' lives easier through automation and user-friendly interfaces.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We stay ahead of industry trends to provide cutting-edge solutions that keep you competitive.

items.title: Quality Assurance
items.description: Our rigorous testing and quality assurance processes ensure that every product we deliver meets the highest standards of excellence.

join.title: Join Us on Your Digital Journey
join.description: Whether you're looking to develop a simple website for your service or a complex, automated software solution, Smooth Flow Tech is here to help you achieve your digital dreams with efficiency and style. Let us help you turn your ideas into reality with a smooth flow.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

items.title: Data Collection and Purpose of Processing

privacy.introduction: At [Smooth Flow Tech], we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy explains how we process personal data when you visit and use our website (www.smoothflowtech.com). We are committed to protecting your data in compliance with the applicable data protection regulations, especially the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

dataCollection.title: Data Collection and Purpose of Processing

items.title: a) Contact Form
items.description: Data: Name, email address, phone number, and message. Purpose: To process your inquiries and respond to your messages. Legal Basis: Article 6(1)(b) GDPR (performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures). Retention Period: We store your data until your inquiry is fully processed and for up to one calendar year to handle follow-up questions.

items.title: b) Social Media Links
items.description: Our website contains links to our social media profiles. Clicking these links redirects you to external platforms. We have no control over data collection on these platforms and recommend reviewing the respective privacy policies of the providers.

items.title: c) Hosting
items.description: Data: IP address, date and time of access, browser type and version, operating system. Purpose: To ensure the operation and security of the website.

items.title: d) Data Processing for Services
items.description:
Data: Name, email address, phone number, project- specific details. 
Purpose: To create and deliver agreed-upon services for clients.
Legal Basis: Article 6(1)(b) GDPR (performance of a contract).

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: Data will only be shared if necessary for contract performance (e.g., specific project requirements) or if required by law.

security.title: Security
security.description:
We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against loss, misuse, and unauthorized access, including:

HTTPS encryption for secure data transmission. Regular security updates.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description:
You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

Access: You can request a copy of the personal data we have stored about you.

Rectification: You can request corrections to inaccurate data.

Erasure: You can request deletion of your data unless legal retention obligations prevent this.

Restriction: You can request restrictions on processing your data.

Objection: You can object to the processing of your data.

Data Portability: You can request your data in a commonly used, machine-readable format. To exercise these rights, please contact us at [Insert email address].

complaint.title: Right to Lodge a Complaint
complaint.description:
You have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. In Austria, this is:

Austrian Data Protection Authority

Barichgasse 40-42 1030 Vienna, Austria

https: //www.dsb.gv.at

changesToPrivacyPolicy.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
changesToPrivacyPolicy.description: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy if we make changes to our website or to comply with legal requirements. Please review this policy regularly.
